snippet: The president’s office opened an inquiry into the commissioner’s role in the 2012 killing of 34 miners by officers during a wildcat strike over pay.
abstract: South African police commissioner Riah Phiyega is suspended pending investigation of police misconduct in 2012 killing of 34 striking miners.
lead_paragraph: The president’s office opened an inquiry into the commissioner’s role in the 2012 killing of 34 miners by officers during a wildcat strike over pay.

headline.main: South Africa: Police Commissioner, Under Investigation, Is Suspended
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Police Commissioner, Under Investigation, Is Suspended
